title: AI-Driven Adaptive Gamification Course for Enhancing English Learning Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Emphasis on English Communication Skills in Science, Promoting Self-Directed Learning in an AI-Powered Game Environment

learning_goals: Learners can use over 1,000 science-related core vocabulary items with ≥80% accuracy in an AI-adaptive gaming environment.
Learners achieve ≥30% improvement in science-domain English reading comprehension assessments through gamification activities.
Learners attain a fluency score of ≥4/5 (5-point scale) in science-topic English presentations lasting ≥5 minutes by incorporating AI feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
